name: Dove Oxygen Moisture Shampoo
description:
Dove Oxygen Moisture shampoo is made with a transparent, lightweight formula that cleanses and moisturizes the hair. Key Features:
•        Delicately moisturises without weighing hair down
•        Formulated with Oxyfusion technology; breathes life into fine, flat hair
•        Gives hair up to 95% more visible volume*
•        Makes hair feel touchably soft and smooth
•        Gives limp, flat hair visible fullness and natural bounce
•        Suitable for daily use

 *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
